resources.string: You can enable and disable full kiosk mode in Homer Audio Player UI settings.
Full kiosk mode is not available
To enable kiosk mode you need to install Homer Kiosk Mode as a device owner application.

This action cannot be easily undone.
Return the device to regular use, it will no longer be possible to use full kiosk mode in Homer Player.

Use Factory Reset instead of (or in addition to) using this function.
